INSTALLATION:
******************

Extract the content of the RAR file directly into your "cstrike" folder.

".../steam/steamapps/username/counter-strike source/cstrike"

********************

This map is my FIRST map!
It's very large, for more people.
I believe the next will be more funny..

A site bomb is outdoor, B underground...
I HOPE THIS MAP WILL LIKE YOU ;)
